meanings.definition: A style of music originating in Puerto Rico, characterized by a fusion of reggae, hip-hop, and Latin American music.
meanings.sent1: The reggaeton playing at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to reggaeton while driving in my car.
meanings.sent3: The reggaeton beat was so catchy, it made me want to dance like never before.
meanings.sent4: Her voice flowed through the reggaeton rhythm like a river through a forest.
meanings.sent5: The reggaeton music filled the room with energy and excitement.

meanings.definition: A song or piece of music in the reggaeton style.
meanings.sent1: She released a new reggaeton that became an instant hit.
meanings.sent2: The reggaeton playing on the radio was so catchy.
meanings.sent3: I can't get that reggaeton out of my head, it's stuck on repeat!
meanings.sent4: His reggaeton was like a burst of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The reggaeton track had a perfect blend of beats and melodies.
